PATIENT's ID PATIENT's NAME GENDER Date Of Birth ADDRESS CONTACT NO EMAIL ID USERNAME
{{item.patient_id}} {{item.patient_name}} {{item.gender}} {{item.dob}} {{item.address}} {{item.contact_no}} {{item.email_id}} {{item.username}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-view-all-patients',
  templateUrl: './view-all-patients.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./view-all-patients.component.css']
})
export class ViewAllPatientsComponent {
  allPatients=[

      patient_id:1,
